availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as a farmer in Mercer County.

Spouse: Rachel Cummins
Children: Elizabeth Cummins, Mary J Cummins, William A Cummins, Rachel T Cummins, Susan A Cummins, Nancy E. Cummins, George Bell Cummins, Henry M Cummins, Henrietta Cummins.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, page 48.

U.S. Find a Grave Index, 1600-Present, “Matthew Cummins,” https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=CUM&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=1641&GRid=22465027& accessed 06/02/2017.
